name: Robo War - Metal Robots Fight
description:
It's a time of war, pilot! Are you ready for surprise attacks, intricate tactical maneuvers and the many sneaky tricks your rivals have in store for you? Destroy enemy robots, capture all the beacons, and upgrade your weapons to increase combat strength, speed, and durability of your battle robot. Prove yourself in each map and use different strategies and tactics to emerge victorious from battle!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR MECHA
Earn credits and equip new components to your robot. Let it become the most advanced and heavy bot on the battlefield.

SELECT DIFFERENT ROBOT CLASS
Pick up your favorite bot class and become a very fast and light robot or a very slowly but heavy and destructive battle robot.

COOL GEOGRAPHIC LOCATIONS
Three different maps to based on the size of the team to have
unlimited fun

USE DIFFERENT WEAPONS
There a weapons like guns, machine guns, rocket launchers, laser guns and even more weapons in the future!

STUNNING GRAPHICS
Enjoy stunning graphics and lovely details. Expect very high immersive multiplayer action battles.
